author: yagoodi
title: Location and Service!!!
text:
The Tuscany is located in the Murray Hill area of Manhattan...a great area for walking, browsing, and shopping. The hotel is a lovely place to stay. The service is spectacular. I noticed that there was no full length mirror in the room and the staff delivered a standing mirror to the room. Anything we requested was delivered within minutes.
We stayed in a huge suite (part of their Black Friday deal) which had 2 walk-in closets to accommodate all of our purchases.
I highly recommend this hotel!
Room Tip: If you can get a good deal, go for a suite! See more room tips
